author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-GVC Holdings Says FY ‍Adj. Profit Before Tax up 182% To 178.7 Mln Euros​
text:
March 9 (Reuters) - Gvc Holdings Plc:
* ‍FY CLEAN EBITDA UP 40% TO EUR 239.5M​ * ‍SECOND INTERIM DIVIDEND EUR 0.175, GIVING FULL YEAR EUR 0.34​
* ‍STRONG START TO 2018 WITH NET GAMING REVENUE +16% (+18% IN CONSTANT CURRENCY) UP TO 4 MARCH 2018​
* ‍FY NET GAMING REVENUE +17% TO EUR 925.6M VERSUS PRO FORMA 2016​
* ‍BOARD’S EXPECTATIONS FOR FULL YEAR REMAIN UNCHANGED​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
